content.raw: Issue related to [https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issues/905/allow-gazebo\_model\_path-to-point-to-a](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issues/905/allow-gazebo_model_path-to-point-to-a). Essentially, we can get full functionality if we set `export GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx` \(but gets harmless errors\), but I can’t find another way to set it to get it to work.
content.html: Issue related to https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issues/905/allow-gazebo_model_path-to-point-to-a. Essentially, we can get full functionality if we set export GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx (but gets harmless errors), but I can’t find another way to set it to get it to work.
